commit message:
ImageManager: don't sync on Preferences object during download

1. During storage switch sync is canceled and therefore no images is
being downloaded
2 Preference are changed in activity process, download happens in
refresh process.
make search list elements more compact and adaptive
use 11-13-15sp fonts in all lists
Preferences: fix crash when trying to create directory on android 4.1
ImageManager: synchronize file access via FileLock, not intrisic lock
Storage: implement .cleanup()
Preferences: try create/delete dirs to determine storage writability
Preference: simplify storage preference initialization

Storage: use LinkedHashSet in getWritableStorages

calling code expects returned list to be ordered in same way as
getEaternalFilesDirs reulst is ordered
SyncWorker: fix 'deleted subscription' in new subscription episodes
Split PodcastOperations into 2 services: background and foreground
SyncWorker: fix refresh progress indication broken in 111caab722dcae
delete NEW_EPISODE_ACTION from DownloadReceiver part II
ImageManager: recycle bitmaps after downloading and compressing
SyncWorker: fix detecting audio eps with non-letters in mime-type
SyncWorker: detect audio eps by extension if MIME-type is absent
move openConnectionWithTO from SyncWorker to PodcastHelper
ImageManager: use sampling to decode and store in memory big images
ImageManager: use UrlConnections with timeouts
update podcast database
gradle: bump version to 1.2.5
